generic <typename TType, typename TGenericContext> public value class SignatureDecoder

summary.span: 对签名 Blob 进行解码。

span.span: Decodes signature blobs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅元数据规范23.2： Blob 和签名。For more information, see the Metadata Specification section II.23.2: Blobs and signatures.

param.name: allowTypeSpecifications
param.span: 如果允许 在签名中跟随 (CLASS | VALUETYPE)，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to allow a to follow a (CLASS | VALUETYPE) in the signature; otherwise.

summary.span: 对签名中嵌入的类型进行解码，并将读取器移到类型之前。

span.span: Decodes a type embedded in a signature and advances the reader past the type.
The decoded type.

remarks.format: 目前，只有 `allowTypeSpecifications` 的上下文可以 `true` 位于可移植 PDB 规范定义的 LocalConstantSig 中。At present, the only context where `allowTypeSpecifications` might be `true` is in a LocalConstantSig as defined by the Portable PDB specification.
